script.license: Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
script.title: CM360 Data Warehouse
script.description: Deploy a BigQuery dataset mirroring CM360 account structure. Foundation for solutions on top.
pitches: Mirror all CM360 account configuration in BigQuery.
Attach any number of dashboards, views, or automations on top.
Whatever access the user or service has, thats whats in the warehouse.
Updates on whatever schedule you set.

dataset.description: Create a dataset for bigquery tables.

field.name: auth_bigquery
field.description: Credentials used for writing data.

field.name: recipe_slug
field.description: Place where tables will be created in BigQuery.

field.name: auth_cm
field.description: Credentials used for reading data.

field.name: auth_bigquery
field.description: Credentials used for writing data.

field.name: recipe_slug
field.description: Name of Google BigQuery dataset to create.

field.name: auth_cm
field.description: Credentials used for reading data.

field.name: auth_bigquery
field.description: Credentials to use for BigQuery reads and writes.

field.name: recipe_slug
field.description: Google BigQuery dataset to create tables in.

bigquery.query:
SELECT DISTINCT accountId AS id
            FROM `CM360_userProfiles`
            WHERE NOT ENDS_WITH(userName, '@dcm')
            AND (ARRAY_LENGTH({accounts}) = 0 OR accountId IN UNNEST({accounts}))

field.name: accounts
field.description: List of account ids to pull.
